Package com.philips.pins.shinelib

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SharedPreferencesProvider
    This interface allows to inject a SharedPreferences objects into the BlueLib specifying the way to store information.
    SHNAssociationProcedure
    A placeholder interface for SHNDeviceAssociation.
    SHNAssociationProcedurePlugin
    A procedure used to associate with a peripheral.
    SHNAssociationProcedurePlugin.SHNAssociationProcedureListener
    Interface that provides updates for the association result.
    SHNCapability
    A placeholder interface.
    SHNCentral.SHNBondStatusListener  
    SHNCentral.SHNCentralListener
    A listener for changes in the state of SHNCentral.
    SHNDevice
    SHNDevice is a representation of a peripheral inside BlueLib.
    SHNDevice.DiscoveryListener
    Interface that provides updates on Services and Characteristics discovered on the SHNDevice.
    SHNDevice.SHNDeviceListener
    Interface that provides updates for connection state changes of the SHNDevice.
    SHNDeviceAssociation.DeviceRemovedListener
    Interface to receive updates for an associated device getting removed.
    SHNDeviceAssociation.SHNDeviceAssociationListener
    Interface to receive updates for the current association.
    SHNDeviceScanner.SHNDeviceScannerListener
    Interface that provides updates for a scanning result.
    SHNFirmwareInfoResultListener
    A callback used to receive the result of a firmware image request.
    SHNIntegerResultListener
    A callback used to receive the result of a request for an integer.
    SHNMapResultListener<K,V>
    A callback used to receive the result of a request for a map.
    SHNObjectResultListener
    A callback used to receive the result of a request for an object.
    SHNResultListener
    A callback to receive information about a request's result.
    SHNSetResultListener<T>
    A callback used to receive the result of a request for a set.
    SHNStringResultListener
    A callback used to receive the result of a request for a string.
    SHNTemperatureMeasurementResultListener
    A callback used to receive the result of a request for a temperature measurement.
    SHNUserConfiguration
    Interface for managing user data.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SHNCentral
    Central class for handling BlueLib initialisation, associating to peripherals and retrieving currently associated peripherals.
    SHNCentral.Builder
    The SHNCentral.Builder is used to build a SHNCentral object.
    SHNDeviceAssociation
    Class that allows the API users to add new associate peripherals and remove them.
    SHNDeviceFoundInfo
    SHNDeviceFoundInfo contains information obtained from the peripheral during scanning.
    SHNDeviceImpl  
    SHNDeviceScanner
    Class that allows the API users to discover peripherals.
    SHNDeviceScannerInternal  
    SHNFirmwareInfo
    Interface that provides information about a firmware image during firmware upload.
    SHNInternalScanRequest
    Used by the SHNDeviceScannerInternal to scan for devices.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SHNCapabilityType
    Capability types supported by BlueLib.
    SHNCentral.State
    State that the SHNCentral currently is in.
    SHNDevice.State
    Possible states of the peripheral.
    SHNDeviceAssociation.State
    Possible state of SHNDeviceAssociation
    SHNDeviceImpl.SHNBondInitiator  
    SHNDeviceScanner.ScannerSettingDuplicates
    Possible scanning settings.
    SHNFirmwareInfo.SHNFirmwareState
    Possible state of firmware image on a peripheral.
    SHNResult
    Possible requests' outcomes.
    SHNUserConfiguration.ClockFormat
    Supported clock formats.
    SHNUserConfiguration.Handedness
    Supported handedness.
    SHNUserConfiguration.Sex
    Supported genders.
